meanings.definition: Having the ovary below the other floral parts.
meanings.sent1: The hypogynous flower had its ovary positioned lower than the petals and sepals.
meanings.sent2: The botanist identified the hypogynous characteristics of the flower by observing the ovary's location.
meanings.sent3: The hypogynous plant decided to grow its ovary below the rest of its floral parts just to stand out.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of diversity, the hypogynous flower was the rebel with its ovary playing hide-and-seek below the petals.
meanings.sent5: The hypogynous nature of the flower made it unique, with its ovary shyly hiding beneath the other floral components.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a flower in which the ovary is situated below the sepals and petals.
meanings.sent1: The hypogynous arrangement of the flower placed the ovary beneath the sepals and petals.
meanings.sent2: Gardeners appreciate the beauty of hypogynous flowers where the ovary gracefully sits below the sepals and petals.
meanings.sent3: The hypogynous flower felt like a secret agent with its ovary undercover beneath the sepals and petals.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like a hypogynous flower, with the ovary hidden beneath layers of sepals and petals.
meanings.sent5: The hypogynous design of the flower made it a botanical marvel, with the ovary mysteriously tucked below the sepals and petals.
